item.title: Selected Projects
item.description: Here is list of selected projects I worked on. For the sake of confidentiality, I will provide only the minimum information. Operating point search on a Simscape Model of a Backhoe This was the major cross-team application project I participated at MathWorks. The client makes backhoe machines and needed enhanced feature in Simulink Control Design to effectively trim the model (i.e., find the operating point). I led the work on reformulating the optimization problem in model trimming and developed the enhanced features.

item.title: Happy New Year!
item.description: Happy New Year! (Watching Boston 2022 First Night Fireworks across Charles River)

item.title: About
item.description: About me Findop Solutions LLC is a technical consulting company founded in early 2020 by me, Yu Jiang. I hold a PhD degree in Electrical Engineering (minored in Mathematics) from the New York University (NYU), and I am specialized in formulating and solving optimization and control problems in autonomous driving and robotics in general. I am based in the Greater Boston Area, MA. See My Homepage for more details about me.
